test-step.description: When User Trigger Top Level Entry "What's New"
Then Page "What's New" Header and Footer Elements are Interactive
And Complete LHS and Promo Module is Visible
And Product List is Displayed with "Wayfarer Messenger Bag"
When User Trigger Top Level Entry "Women"
Then Page "Women" Header and Footer Elements are Interactive

test-step.description: And Complete LHS and Promo Module is Visible
And Product List is Displayed with "Radiant Tee"
When User Trigger Top Level Entry "Men"
Then Page "Men" Header and Footer Elements are Interactive
And Complete LHS and Promo Module is Visible
And Product List is Displayed with "Geo Insulated Jogging Pant"
